com.worklight.wlclient.api

Class WLLifecycleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worklight.wlclient.api.WLLifecycleHelper

  • public class WLLifecycleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    WLLifecycleHelper is a singleton used to help manage instrumentation of the android activity lifecycle.
